content.body: Meghan Denny: I think because of: "If the longest possible match could match one of the above named terminal symbols or one of the other terminal symbols from the grammar, it must be tokenized as the latter." in https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#idl-grammar
content.formatted_body: Meghan Denny: I think because of: "If the longest possible match could match one of the above named terminal symbols or one of the other terminal symbols from the grammar, it must be tokenized as the latter." in https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#idl-grammar

content.body: right, okay yeah that makes sense I think I didnt connect 2-and-2 for a sec
that means when AttributeName is added to the ast it needs to be distinguishable which one it matched as
that was the part I was looking for but I can read the doc more to find out
<https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#idl-attributes> doesnt mention it so maybe not?
